input: What are the top 10 consumed local parts under En-Route from January to December 2024?
query: SELECT TOP 10 rp.[part_code], rp.[part_desc], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rp.[part_quantity] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [Total_Count], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rp.[partamount] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [Total_Value] FROM [MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS] rohdr LEFT JOIN [MH_RO_PARTS] rp ON rohdr.[sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk] = rp.[sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk] WHERE rohdr.[ro_bill_date] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' AND ((rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'En-Route' AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Pre-Sale/PDI')) AND rp.[part_category_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Spares' AND rp.[part_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%filter%' AND rp.[oem_part_ind] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'N' GROUP BY rp.[part_code], rp.[part_desc] ORDER BY [Total_Count] DESC

input: Top 10 consumed Local parts under Paid Service from January to December 2024
query: SELECT TOP 10 rp.[part_code], rp.[part_desc], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rp.[part_quantity] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [Total_Count], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rp.[partamount] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [Total_Value] FROM [MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS] AS rohdr LEFT JOIN [MH_RO_PARTS] AS rp ON rohdr.[sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk] = rp.[sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk] WHERE rohdr.[ro_bill_date] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' AND ((rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Paid Service' AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Mechanical') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories' AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop' AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Charging' AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Others') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('En-Route', 'Pre-Sale/PDI') AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Pre-Sale/PDI')) AND rp.[part_category_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Spares' AND rp.[part_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%filter%' AND rp.[oem_part_ind] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'N' GROUP BY rp.[part_code], rp.[part_desc] ORDER BY [Total_Count] DESC

input: What are the top 10 consumed Dealer Labour hours under Repair category across dealers from January to March 2024?
query: SELECT TOP 10 ad.[delr_name] AS [Dealer_Name], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rl.[standrd_hrs] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [Total_Count], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rl.[labrAmount] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [Total_Value] FROM [MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS] AS rohdr LEFT JOIN [MH_RO_LABOUR] AS rl ON rohdr.[sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk] = rl.[sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk] LEFT JOIN [MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION] AS ad ON rohdr.[parnt_grop] = ad.[parnt_grop] AND rohdr.[loctn_cd] = ad.[loctn_cd] AND rohdr.[prodct_divsn] = ad.[prodct_divsn] WHERE ((rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('Free Service', 'Paid Service', 'Repair') AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Mechanical') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories' AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop' AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Charging' AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Others') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('En-Route', 'Pre-Sale/PDI') AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Pre-Sale/PDI')) AND rl.[labour_type_name] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Dealer Defined' AND rohdr.[ro_bill_date] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-03-31' GROUP BY ad.[delr_name] ORDER BY [Total_Count] DESC

input: Top 10 Dealers with highest OEM Labour consumption under Repair from January to December 2024
query: SELECT TOP 10 ad.[delr_name] AS [Dealer_Name], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rl.[standrd_hrs] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [Total_Hours], ROUND(SUM(TRY_CAST(rl.[labrAmount] AS FLOAT)), 1) AS [Total_Value] FROM [MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS] AS rohdr LEFT JOIN [MH_RO_LABOUR] AS rl ON rohdr.[sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk] = rl.[sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk] LEFT JOIN [MH_AD_AI_DIMENSION] AS ad ON rohdr.[parnt_grop] = ad.[parnt_grop] AND rohdr.[loctn_cd] = ad.[loctn_cd] AND rohdr.[prodct_divsn] = ad.[prodct_divsn] WHERE ((rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('Free Service', 'Paid Service', 'Repair') AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Mechanical') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories' AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop' AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Charging' AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Others') OR (rohdr.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('En-Route', 'Pre-Sale/PDI') AND rohdr.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Pre-Sale/PDI')) AND rl.[labour_type_name] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'OEM Defined' AND rl.[labour_group_name] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%Local%' AND rohdr.[ro_bill_date] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' GROUP BY ad.[delr_name] ORDER BY [Total_Hours] DESC

input: Generate a Word Cloud for the model group code 'XUVN' from January to March 2024, excluding common maintenance terms
query: SELECT mm.[modl_grop_cd] AS [Model_Group_Code], cv.[verbatim_group], cv.[verbatim_code], cv.[cust_verbtm_desc], cv.[verbatim_group_desc], cv.[demanded_verbatim], COUNT(cv.[verbatim_code]) AS [frequency_count] FROM [mh_cust_verbatim] AS [cv] JOIN [mh_ro_hdr_details] AS [rhd] ON [cv].[sv_ro_hdr_sk] = [rhd].[sv_ro_hdr_sk] JOIN [mh_model_master] AS [mm] ON [rhd].[modl_cd] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = [mm].[modl_cd] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS WHERE [mm].[modl_grop_cd] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'XUVN' AND [rhd].[ro_bill_date] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-03-31' AND [cv].[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%schedule%' AND [cv].[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%washing%' AND [cv].[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%maxicare%' AND [cv].[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel alignment%' AND [cv].[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel balance%' AND [cv].[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%service action%' AND [cv].[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%10000%' AND [cv].[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%1000%' AND [cv].[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%5000%' AND [cv].[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%km%' GROUP BY mm.[modl_grop_cd], cv.[verbatim_group], cv.[verbatim_code], cv.[cust_verbtm_desc], cv.[verbatim_group_desc], cv.[demanded_verbatim] ORDER BY [frequency_count] DESC

input: Word Cloud for XUV300 Diesel MT BS6 customer verbatims from Jan-Dec 2024
query: SELECT mm.[FAMLY_DESC] AS [Family_Description], cv.[verbatim_group], cv.[verbatim_code], cv.[cust_verbtm_desc], cv.[verbatim_group_desc], cv.[demanded_verbatim], COUNT(cv.[verbatim_code]) AS [frequency_count] FROM MH_CUST_VERBATIM AS cv JOIN MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS AS rhd ON rhd.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] = cv.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] JOIN MH_MODEL_MASTER AS mm ON rhd.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = mm.[MODL_CD] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS WHERE mm.[FAMLY_DESC] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'XUV300 Diesel MT BS6' AND rhd.[ro_bill_date] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' AND ((rhd.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('free service', 'paid service', 'en-route repair', 'repair') AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'mechanical') OR (rhd.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('accessories', 'bodyshop')) OR (rhd.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'sales & service' AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'accessories') OR (rhd.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'bodyshop' AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'pre-sale/pdi')) AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%schedule%' AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%washing%' AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%maxicare%' AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel alignment%' AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%wheel balance%' AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%service action%' AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%10000%' AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%1000%' AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%5000%' AND cv.[demanded_verbatim] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT LIKE '%km%' GROUP BY mm.[FAMLY_DESC], cv.[verbatim_group], cv.[verbatim_code], cv.[cust_verbtm_desc], cv.[verbatim_group_desc], cv.[demanded_verbatim] ORDER BY [frequency_count] DESC

input: What are the Top 5 most frequently reported Voice of Customer (VoC) issues that repeat for the period January to March 2024?
query: SELECT TOP 5 cv.[verbatim_code], COUNT() AS [repeat_count], STRING_AGG(cv.[demanded_verbatim], '; ') AS [combined_verbatim] FROM [MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS] AS rohdr INNER JOIN [MH_CUST_VERBATIM] AS cv ON rohdr.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] = cv.[sv_ro_hdr_sk] WHERE rohdr.[ro_date] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-03-31' AND rohdr.[repeat_repair_flag] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Y' GROUP BY cv.[verbatim_code] ORDER BY COUNT() DESC

input: Top 5 most frequently reported repeating parts by model group from January to March 2024
query: SELECT TOP 5 rp.[part_code], rp.[part_desc], COUNT(rp.[part_code]) AS [Total_Count], SUM(TRY_CAST(rp.[part_quantity] AS FLOAT)) AS [Total_Quantity], SUM(TRY_CAST(rp.[partamount] AS FLOAT)) AS [Total_Value] FROM MH_RO_PARTS rp LEFT JOIN MH_RO_HDR_DETAILS rhd ON rhd.[sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk] = rp.[sv_ro_bill_hdr_sk] LEFT JOIN MH_MODEL_MASTER mm ON rhd.[modl_cd] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = mm.[modl_cd] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS WHERE rhd.[ro_bill_date] BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-03-31' AND rhd.[repeat_repair_flag] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Y' AND ((rhd.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('Free Service', 'Paid Service', 'Repair') AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Mechanical') OR (rhd.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories' AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Accessories') OR (rhd.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop' AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Bodyshop') OR (rhd.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Charging' AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Others') OR (rhd.[serv_catgry_desc] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS IN ('En-Route', 'Pre-Sale/PDI') AND rhd.[service_group] COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS = 'Pre-Sale/PDI')) GROUP BY rp.[part_code], rp.[part_desc] ORDER BY [Total_Count] DESC
